name: RERL
description:
My first RogueLike, for 7DRL 2019!  An XRL based on Resident Evil built with rot.js

New: All boss portraits, and abilities usable by the player including targeting.  

Instructions: 4-way movement with arrow, vi keys, or wasd.  Abilities with Q, E, R.  period key to wait.  Enter key to confirm a target.  You can also click the buttons but there is no other mouse support... yet!  

Known Issues

* enemies can charge you into walls, removing vision

Github: https://github.com/samspot/7dayrl2019

Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/samspot/videos
